name: Mama's Baby
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam #45 Theme: Hatch an Egg

Mama's baby is a game about being a good mama for your baby. 

Your job is to take care of a little chicken through all the stages and challenges of a chicken's life.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move the chicken.

Sound effects from http://www.freesfx.co.uk/ .
